function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate power supply to the IEQ concentrator may result in data loss or system downtime.","Impact":"Loss of data and reduced availability of IEQ monitoring system.","Mitigation":"Use of backup power sources such as UPS, regular maintenance of power supply equipment.","Technologies":"Uninterruptible Power Supply (UPS), regular power supply monitoring systems.","People":"Maintenance staff, system administrators, researchers.","Owner":"Maintenance staff, system administrators, researchers."},{"Description":"Inadequate WiFi coverage may limit the deployment of smart IEQ sensor nodes, leading to incomplete monitoring of certain areas within the built environment.","Impact":"Incomplete monitoring and potential gaps in IEQ data collection.","Mitigation":"Use of WiFi range extenders, site survey for optimal placement of smart IEQ sensor nodes.","Technologies":"WiFi range extenders, site survey tools for WiFi coverage analysis.","People":"System administrators, IT support, researchers.","Owner":"System administrators, researchers."},{"Description":"Insufficient energy efficiency measures for smart sensors may result in higher energy consumption and reduced autonomy of the monitoring system.","Impact":"Increased energy costs, shorter sensor node autonomy, environmental impact.","Mitigation":"Implementation of sleep modes for sensors, use of energy-efficient sensor models, periodic energy consumption audits.","Technologies":"Sensor sleep mode programming, energy-efficient sensor models, energy consumption monitoring tools.","People":"System administrators, sustainability managers, researchers.","Owner":"System administrators, sustainability managers, researchers."}]}
